statements: SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, city FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, city FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC, city ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city, customer_name FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY city, customer_name LIMIT 8;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE city LIKE 'New%' OR city LIKE 'Los%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, age, city FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY age DESC, city LIMIT 7;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, age, city FROM customers WHERE age < 25 AND city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, city FROM customers ORDER BY gender, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, age, city FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT customer_name, city, product_name FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE product_name LIKE '%phone%'
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM customers ORDER BY city DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age, city FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date, discount FROM promotions WHERE discount > 0.1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, city FROM customers WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price FROM purchases JOIN promotions ON purchases.customer_id = promotions.promotion_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT email FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT promo_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE discount >= 0.1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT customer_id, city, COUNT(*) AS num_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id, city HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;

SELECT cust.first_name, dem.income, promo.promo_name FROM customers AS cust JOIN demographics AS dem ON cust.customer_id = dem.customer_id JOIN promotions AS promo ON promo.start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT city, state, country FROM Customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Purchases ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM Promotions ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, city, state, country FROM Customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
